item.title: Oh, The Horror
item.description: I was forwarded a link to the original, left on the cutting room floor ending of the Roger Corman classic horror film “Little Shop of Horrors” and not only was it a timely tidbit for Halloween, but it was also strangely appropriate for the election. Enjoy your candy…
